participant_1.background:
I want a home with a big yard for my dogs to run and play in.
I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
i do not know if i enjoy programming , or if its my only choice.
I have been learning more about the business through my parents and have been taking on more responsibilities.
i never sleep in.

participant_2.background:
I spend my free time training and relaxing.
I am more concerned about my physical comfort than my appearance.
i would travel the world if i could.
i like chasing comodo lizards on a private island.
My family is my everything.

content.text: Morning!
Good morning!
How are you today?
I am doing well, thank you! How about you?
I am doing great! I am just getting ready to go outside and enjoy the sunshine.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day! I am actually just about to start training for a marathon.
That is so cool! Are you running your first marathon?
Yes, this is my first one! I am really excited about it, but also a little nervous.
I am sure you will do great! Just keep training hard and you will be fine.
Thank you! I appreciate the encouragement.
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
I am a personal trainer. I love helping people get in shape and live healthier lives.
That sounds like an awesome job! I am sure you help a lot of people.
I try my best! I love my job.
That is great! I am glad to hear that.
So, what are you passionate about?
I love pottery and photography. I also enjoy spending time with my dogs.
Pottery and photography sound really cool! I have always wanted to learn pottery.
You should! It is a lot of fun. I love being able to create something with my own hands.
That is what I love about working out! It is so rewarding to see your progress and know that you are working hard to improve yourself.
I agree! Working out is definitely one of my favorite ways to relieve stress.
It is definitely a great way to clear your head.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my family and friends. I also enjoy traveling and trying new things.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love trying new things too.
Me too! It is so much fun to experience new things and learn about different cultures.
I agree! It is one of the best ways to learn and grow.
I think so too!
Well, it was nice chatting with you! I hope you have a great day!
You too! It was nice talking to you too!
